data.text:
With over 25 years of experience in car rentals in Thessaloniki, Ride & Drive guarantees comfort and safety for every journey. The trust we have built makes us the first choice for travelers seeking reliable car rental solutions in Thessaloniki at the most competitive prices.

Featuring a fleet that is continuously updated, we ensure that our clients drive the most modern and safe vehicles. Whether it’s a short city trip or a long journey to Chalkidiki or other surrounding areas, Ride & Drive has the perfect vehicle for every need and preference.

RESERVATION IN 4 EASY STEPS

1. Search

Select the dates and times of interest.

2. Compare

Choose from a wide range of cars to find the perfect one for you.

3. Finalize

Add your details, as well as any extra services you desire.

4. All Set

You will receive the booking confirmation in your email along with all the necessary instructions.

Modern and reliable vehicles

Frequent and strict inspections

Vehicle replacement in case of breakdown

Reservation without a credit card

Impeccable customer service

Competitive prices

VEHICLES THAT TAKE YOU PLACES

TRANSFER FROM/TO THESSALONIKI AIRPORT

Ride & Drive is just 5 minutes away from Macedonia Airport. To facilitate every step of your journey, we offer a transfer service to and from the airport.

Whether you’re traveling solo or in a group, we’ve got your transportation needs covered. We provide spacious private mini-vans, with ample room for you and your luggage.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Online Booking: Easily reserve your car rental directly on our site. Just choose your travel destination in Greece, select your desired rental dates and times, and click “Continue Booking.” Browse through our selection of car categories and models to find the perfect match for your needs. Fill in your basic details -name, phone number, email, and arrival dates- to finalize your booking in just a few minutes.

Phone Booking: If online booking isn’t your preference, you can book your rental car over the phone for a personal touch. Dial 0030 2310 600024, and our friendly reservations team will assist you swiftly. We’re available Monday to Friday from 08:30-20:00 and Saturday from 09:00-17:00 to help make your booking experience as smooth as possible.

The process for receiving your rental car depends on your arrival destination. At Thessaloniki airport, for instance, our experienced staff will greet you with a sign bearing your name. During winter, the greeting takes place inside the arrivals hall, while from spring onwards, we’ll meet you at the designated meeting point just outside arrivals. Our driver will then escort you to our nearby offices, a brief 8-minute journey from Thessaloniki Macedonia Airport. For destinations other than Thessaloniki, we will provide you with specific instructions to ensure a smooth meetup with our driver. Should you have any questions or require further assistance regarding the pickup process, please don’t hesitate to contact us.

To get your rental car, follow these simple steps upon arrival at our offices:

Our skilled team will quickly and efficiently prepare your car rental contract in just five minutes.

You will need to present two documents: a valid driving license and proof of identity (either a National ID or passport).

Please note the driver requirements:

The driver must be at least 23 years old but not older than 75.

New drivers should have held a valid driving license for a minimum of 2 years.

With Ride & Drive, you’re granted unlimited mileage without any extra charges, allowing you to travel across Greece freely in your rental car. However, it’s important to be aware of the key restrictions in place:

Traveling Outside Greece: It’s against our rental agreement terms to take the rented car outside of Greece. No insurance coverage will be provided if the car is taken across the country’s borders.

Ferry Travel: You are allowed to board a ferry to travel to an island with your rental car, but this requires Ride & Drive’s prior consent. Be aware that our insurance coverage does not extend to ferry travel.

There is an additional charge of €20 for picking up or returning the rental car outside regular hours, specifically from 21:00 in the evening to 08:00 in the morning.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY ABOUT US

USEFUL INFORMATION ABOUT THESSALONIKI

There are dozens of hotels, hostels, and accommodations in the city of Thessaloniki. Rent your car today and discover Thessaloniki.

Renting a car in Thessaloniki can give you easier access to entertainment venues for you and your group!

Regarding entertainment, there are many things to do in Thessaloniki. You can find all kinds of recreational activities that will satisfy even the most demanding.

Indeed, Thessaloniki, according to research conducted, is the city with the most bars, clubs, general entertainment, and leisure activities per square meter in all of Europe.

For car rental in Thessaloniki, Ride & Drive has the ideal car for you! The second-largest city in Greece, Thessaloniki, is filled with museums offering a wide variety of exhibits. The city has some of the most important museums in Greece.

It also has several galleries with very interesting exhibits. The Museum of Byzantine Culture, the Jewish Museum of Thessaloniki, the National Museum of Contemporary Art, the Museum of Contemporary Art, the Museum of Contemporary Art, some additional historical and cultural knowledge about Greece. Here you can discover the best museums to visit in Thessaloniki!

The city of Thessaloniki is a place where modern lifestyle, archaeological sites, and natural landscapes coexist, making your visit a unique experience. Touring the region of Thessaloniki, you will encounter many settlements where you can admire beautiful natural landscapes.
